# Recommender - Find the Recommendation Hub
# Find the Recommendation Hub
**    Preview    — Recommendation Hub ** This feature is subject to the "Pre-GA Offerings Terms" in the General Service Terms section   of the [Service Specific Terms](/terms/service-terms#1) .     Pre-GA features are available "as is" and might have limited support.    For more information, see the [launch stage descriptions](/products#product-launch-stages) .
This page shows you how you how to find the Recommendation Hub.
content:
## Before you begin
Enroll in the [Recommender Viewer role](/iam/docs/understanding-roles#recommender.viewer) or Identity and Access Management [Basic Roles](/iam/docs/understanding-roles#basic) to get access to view all recommendations available to you. Alternatively, you can reference the [recommender list page](/recommender/docs/recommenders) to determine what permissions you need for each recommender.
Note that each recommender has its own specific roles and permissions to control access, which may include some metadata about its resources.
You can only see recommendations at an organization or folder level if you have permissions for that organization or folder, regardless of your permissions for folders or projects within it.
## Navigate to the Recommendation Hub
There are a few options to find your recommendations in Google Cloud console.- Directly visit Recommendation Hub. [Go to Recommendations](https://console.cloud.google.com/home/recommendations) 
- Click **Recommendations** from Google Cloud console home. [Google Cloud console](https://console.cloud.google.com/) 
- Under the **Tools** section in the left hand navigation in Google Cloud console, go to **Active Assist** > **Dashboards** . [Google Cloud console](https://console.cloud.google.com/) ## What's next
- [Adjust the scope of your recommendations](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/adjust-scope) 
- [Find recommendations](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/find-recommendations) 
- [Share recommendations](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/share-recommendations) 
- [Apply or dismiss recommendations](/recommender/docs/recommendation-hub/changing-applying-recommendations)
